shared.facades

Class ResourcesFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.facades.AbstractFacade
      • shared.facades.ResourcesFacade

  • public class ResourcesFacade
extends AbstractFacade
    Provides operations for users to manipulate their resources.

      • canPurchaseItem

        public boolean canPurchaseItem(@NotNull
                               Player player,
                               @NotNull
                               PurchaseType item)
        Identifies if the given player has the resources required to purchase the item requested.
        Parameters:
        player - the player to check against, not null
        item - the type of purchase that is desired, not null
        Returns:
        whether the player could purchase the item requested
        Precondition:
        The player is in a valid game and they can purchase items, item is valid
        Postcondition:
        None.

      • purchaseItem

        public void purchaseItem(@NotNull
                         Player player,
                         @NotNull
                         PurchaseType item)
        Deduct the resources required to purchase a request item for a player.
        Parameters:
        player - the player to deduct from, not null
        item - the item to purchase, not null
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the preconditions are not met.
        Precondition:
        canPurchaseItem(Player, PurchaseType) returns true
        Postcondition:
        The player will have the cost of item deducted from their resources., The game's bank of resources will be updated accordingly.

      • canReceiveFromBank

        public boolean canReceiveFromBank(@NotNull
                                  Player player,
                                  @NotNull
                                  ResourceList resources)
        Whether the player can receive the resources from the bank.

        The bank must have the resources to be able to fulfill the request.

        Parameters:
        player - the player to check against, not null
        resources - the set of resources requested from the bank, not null
        Returns:
        whether the player can receive the resources from the bank

      • receiveFromBank

        public void receiveFromBank(@NotNull
                            Player player,
                            @NotNull
                            ResourceList resources)
        Whether the player can receive the resources from the bank.

        The bank must have the resources to be able to fulfill the request.

        Parameters:
        player - the player to check against, not null
        resources - the set of resources requested from the bank, not null
        Precondition:
        canReceiveFromBank(shared.models.game.Player, shared.models.game.ResourceList) returns true.
        Postcondition:
        The bank has its resources deducted by resources, which are received by player.

      • returnToBank

        public void returnToBank(@NotNull
                         Player player,
                         @NotNull
                         ResourceList resources)
        Whether the player can return the specified resources to the bank.

        The player must have the resources to be able to fulfill the request.

        Parameters:
        player - the player to check against, not null
        resources - the set of resources returning to the bank, not null
        Precondition:
        canReturnToBank(shared.models.game.Player, shared.models.game.ResourceList) returns true.
        Postcondition:
        The player has their resources deducted by resources, which are received by the bank.
